thread.title: Gigi Hadid Almost Fell at Moschino Fall 2017 Show - Models Falling
thread.title_full: Gigi Hadid Almost Fell at Moschino Fall 2017 Show - Models Falling

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Gigi Hadid Almost Fell at Moschino Fall 2017 Show - Models Falling
text:
Narrowly escaping the same fate as Naomi Campbell walking Vivienne Westwood long ago, Gigi Hadid managed to avoid tripping on the long hem of her carpet-inspired (really) gown on the Moschino runway.
As she strode down the taped-up cardboard runway — Jeremy Scott's theme for the season was haute detritus, with the standout look being a dry-cleaning-bag dress in which the wearer acts as the hanger — the dramatic lip-sync-er caught her heel in the tapestry's fringe.
